header.title: SafetyHelp
header.tagline: Tshireletso Ya Gago, Go Tlhokomela Go Dirilwe Go Le Bonolo‚ÄîNako Efe Le Efe, Kae Kapa Kae
sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Amogelang kwa SafetyHelp
sidebar.step_0.description: Batla dithuto tsa rona tse di tletseng le ditirelo go thusa go tokafatsa tshireletso ya boitekanelo ba mmele le tshireletso mo lefelong la gago la tiro.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° A o tseba gore go dirisa bafepedi ba ba ka tshwanelwang ba ka fokotsa dikotsi tsa lefelong la tiro ka go netefatsa gore tiro e dirwa ka nako le ka boleng jo bo kwa godimo le maemo a tshireletso?
intro.title: Amogelang kwa SafetyHelp
intro.description: Batla dithuto tsa rona tse di tletseng le ditirelo go thusa go tokafatsa tshireletso ya boitekanelo ba mmele le tshireletso mo lefelong la gago la tiro.
welcome.title: Amogelang kwa SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Sethala sa gago se se ka tshwanelwang sa tshireletso ya boitekanelo ba mmele (OHS) mo Afrika Borwa. Re fana ka dithuto tse di itirang tse di kgonagatswang ke AI go netefatsa tshireletso le go tlangiwa mo mafelong a tiro, dikolong, dikerekeng, le dikarolong tse di sa tlhamalang. Ikopanye le set≈°haba sa rona go fitlhelela dithuto, ditirelo, le tshegetso e e dirilweng ka boikaelelo bakeng sa ditlhoko tsa gago.
why_choose.title: Ke Eng o Tlhoka go Kgetha SafetyHelp go Tlangiwa ka OHS?
why_choose.content: SafetyHelp ke molekane wa gago yo o ka tshwanelwang mo go tlangiwa ka tshireletso ya boitekanelo ba mmele mo Afrika Borwa. Sethala sa rona se fana ka dithuto tse di tletseng tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo go ka kgontsha ditlhoko tse di kgethegileng tsa mainding a a kang kago, merafo, le tlhabololo. Go tswa mo go direng direjistara tsa molao go ya go go leka kotsi, SafetyHelp e nolofatsa ditlhoko tsa OHS tse di thata ka di-wizard tse di bonolo go di dirisa le tshegetso ya nako ya nnete ka chatbot ya rona e e kgonagatswang ke AI. E tshegeditswe ke melao ya Afrika Borwa le mekgwa e e siameng, re kgontsha mainding go dira mafelo a tiro a a sireletsegileng ka nako e le nngwe re netefatsa go tlangiwa ka OHSA le COIDA. Ikopanye le ba ba dikete ba ba tshwanelwang ba ba itekang kwa SafetyHelp go sireletsa dikgwebo tsa bona le go nolofatsa mekgwa ya tshireletso.
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikgantsho ba Mokgatho
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Go Leka Kotsi ya Motheo (BRA) e e kgetholang dikotsi tsa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhokomelo ya Boitekanelo le Tshireletso e e kgetholang ditlhoko tse di kgethegileng tsa projeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Molao wa Kago 5(1)(l): Amogela Lenaneo la Boitekanelo le Tshireletso la Mokgatho pele tiro e simolola.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikgantsho ba Mokgatho
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(a): Romela Lenaneo la Boitekanelo le Tshireletso le le theilweng ka tlhokomelo ya mokgatho.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao wa Kago 7(1)(b): Boloka Faile ya Boitekanelo le Tshireletso mo saeteng e nang le ditokomane tse di tlhokegang tsohle.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Molao wa Kago 9: Dira Go Leka Kotsi le Go Kgethola Kotsi ya Tshireletso (HIRAs) ka boikaelelo bakeng sa tiro.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikgantsho ba Porofeshenale ya Boitekanelo le Tshireletso
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Molao wa Kago 5(5): Baemedi (PrCHSA) ba laola Boitekanelo le Tshireletso ka lebitso la mokgatho, ba netefatsa go tlangiwa.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Molao wa Kago 8(5): Baofisiri (CHSO) ba thusa bokgatho go dirisa le go sekaseka ditsamaiso tsa Boitekanelo le Tshireletso.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Maitshwaro a SACPCMP: Go tshwanetswe go boloka ngodiso le ditlhoko tsa CPD go boloka maemo a porofeshenale.

footer.newsletter.title: Nna o Tlhagisitswe
chatbot.welcome: Dumela! Nka go thusa jang ka OHS gompieno?
chatbot.response: Ke mo go go thusa! Go ka kgona go tshwanela go ikgolaganya le setsebi go fitlhelela boeletsi ba OHS bo bo dirilweng ka boikaelelo.
page_title.construction: SafetyHelp - Tshireletso ya Boitekanelo mo Kagong
construction.title: Tshireletso ya Boitekanelo mo Kagong
construction.description: Netefatsa go tlangiwa ka melao ya tshireletso ya boitekanelo mo kagong ka go dirisa dithuto tsa OHS tsa SafetyHelp. Dithuto tsa rona di go thusa go laola dikotsi, go tlangiwa ka melao, le go sireletsa basebetsi mo saeteng, go tswa mo mekgweng e e siameng e e tlhalositsweng mo 'Tshireletso ya Pele: Ditlhokwa tsa Mapulane a OHS.'
construction.download_link: Download Lenaneo la OHS la Kago:
legal_appointments.title: Go Thapiwa ka Molao
legal_appointments.description: Laola go thapiwa ka molao ga boitekanelo ba mmele le tshireletso jaaka go tlhokega ke melao ya OHS ya Afrika Borwa. Dirisa organogram go abela mabaka, tlatsa dintlha tsa ba ba thapilweng, mme o hlame tokomaneng e e tletseng e e nang le ditlhaka tsa go thapiwa, direkoto tsa thupelo, le tse dingwe.
organogram.title: Organogram ya Go Thapiwa ka Molao ga OHS
organogram.form.name: Leina la Motho yo o Thapilweng
organogram.form.name_error: Ka kopo tsenya leina la motho yo o thapilweng.
organogram.form.email_error: Ka kopo tsenya imeile e e sebetsang.
organogram.form.phone_error: Ka kopo tsenya nomoro ya mogala e e sebetsang (mohlala, +27123456789).
organogram.form.start_date_error: Ka kopo tsenya letsatsi la go simolola.
organogram.form.training_error: Ka kopo tsenya dintlha tsa thupelo/bokgoni.
legislation.title: Molao
legislation.description: Fitlhelela laeborari e e tletseng ya melao ya OHS, maemo, le ditlhakiso. Hlama direjistara tsa molao tsa OHS, batla melao e e kgethegileng, mme o sekaseke kamano magareng ga melao. Ditlhaloso tse di nolofaditsweng di teng go rekiwa go dira gore ditokomane tsa molao tse di thata di tshwanelwe ke go utlwiwa.
legislation.tools.title: Dithuto tsa Molao
legislation.updates.title: Ditlhakiso tsa Molao le Ditlhako
legislation.standards.title: Maemo a OHS
services.title: Ditirelo tsa SafetyHelp
services.description: Bona mefuta e e farologaneng ya ditirelo tsa boitekanelo ba mmele le tshireletso tse di dirilweng go tshegetsa mafelo a tiro, dikolo, dikereke, le dikarolo tse di sa tlhamalang ka bophara mo Afrika Borwa. Go tswa mo go buisaneng go ya go thupelo, SafetyHelp e fana ka dikatlanegiso tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo go netefatsa go tlangiwa le tshireletso.
services.consulting.title: Boeletsi ba OHS
services.consulting.description: Bona boeletsi ba setsebi ka go tlangiwa ka OHS, go laola kotsi, le go thapiwa ka molao go tswa mo baithuting ba rona ba ba netefaditsweng. Re dirile le mekgatlo e e kang Anglo Platinum, ABSA, le Metrorail go fana ka dikatlanegiso tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo.
services.training.title: Mananeo a Thupelo
services.training.description: Fitlhelela mananeo a thupelo a a tletseng a a akaretsang mainding otlhe, go akaretsa kago, tlhabololo, le thuto. Kgetha thupelo ya go simolola, dikgato tse di kgethegileng tsa boemo, le tse dingwe, tsohle di tlangiwa ka melao ya OHS ya Afrika Borwa.
services.audits.title: Go Lekola & Go Sekaseka
services.audits.description: Netefatsa gore lefelo la gago la tiro le tlangiwa ka maemo a OHS ka ditirelo tsa rona tsa go lekola le go sekaseka. Dithuto tsa rona di go thusa go dira go lekola ka botlalo, go hlama dingxelo, le go dira ditshwetso tsa go lokisa.
services.risk_management.title: Mananeo a go Laola Kotsi
services.risk_management.description: Hlame mananeo a go laola kotsi (RMPs) a a dirilweng ka boikaelelo a a akaretsang melao ya Afrika Borwa, melao ya bomasepala, le maemo a lefatshe a a kang ISO 45001, go netefatsa gore kgwebo ya gago e lokiseditswe go ka kgona dikotsi tsotlhe.
services.support.title: Tshegetso & Dithuto tsa Set≈°haba
services.support.description: Ikgolaganye le set≈°haba sa rona go ka kgona go tlaleha ditiragalo, go fitlhelela dilista tsa tshireletso tsa dikgwebisana tsa spaza, dikolo, le ditavern, le go ikgolaganya le baithuti ba bangwe ba OHS go fitlhelela tshegetso le t≈°homi≈°ano.
training.title: Thupelo e e Tletseng ya Lefelo la Tiro
training.description: Sekaseka mananeo a rona a thupelo a a tletseng a lefelo la tiro go netefatsa go tlangiwa ka melao ya OHS ya Afrika Borwa le go kgothaletsa lefelo la tiro le le sireletsegileng. Kgetha thupelo ya go dirisa ka matsogo, thupelo ya sehlopha, kgotsa dirisa wizard ya rona go fitlhelela dikatlanegiso tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo go ya ka mainding a gago, batho bao o ba lebisitseng, le lefelo.
training.action_buttons.view_manual: Reka Bukana ya Thupelo e e ka Dirwang ka Boikaelelo

training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Tlhagiso ya SafetyHelp: Didirisiwa tsa thupelo tse di filweng ke tsa tshedimosetsong fela mme ga di emele boeletsi ba setsebi. Go ka kgona go tshwanela go ikgolaganya le SafetyHelp go fitlhelela dikatlanegiso tsa OHS tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo, ka imeile: support@safetyhelp.co.za kgotsa etela Letlakala la go Ikgolaganya.
training.checkout.success: Go lefa go atlegile! Didirisiwa tsa gago tsa thupelo di hlamilwe. Download PDF tsa gago ka fa tlase. Bakeng sa thupelo ya inthanete, dikhouto tsa go fitlhelela di rometswe ka imeile.

training.manual.purchase.description: Fitlhelela bukana ya thupelo e e tletseng e e dirilweng ka boikaelelo bakeng sa khampani ya gago, go akaretsa ditlhoko tsa molao, diteng tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo go ya ka profayile ya gago ya kotsi, le ditshutiso go tswa mo bafepeding ba thupelo ba ba netefaditsweng.

training.legal_fact.step_1: Nnete ya Molao: Karolo 8 ya Molao wa OHS e tlhoka gore ba≈°omi ba fane ka thupelo e e dirilweng ka boikaelelo go ka kgona dikotsi tse di kgethegileng tsa lefelo la tiro.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Nnete e e Kgatlhisang: A o tseba gore thupelo e e tshwanetseng e ka fokotsa ditiragalo tsa lefelo la tiro go fitlha ka 30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Nnete ya Molao: Bomasepala ba selegae ba ka nna le melao ya OHS e e farologaneng e e amang ditlhoko tsa thupelo.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Nnete e e Kgatlhisang: Mafelo a tiro a a nang le kotsi e kgolo a a kang disaete tsa kago a tlhoka thupelo e e tshwanetseng go boloka maemo a tshireletso.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Nnete ya Molao: Molao wa OHS o tlhoka thupelo e kgethegileng bakeng sa mabaka a a kang baemedi ba SHE go netefatsa go tlangiwa.
legislation.wizard.title: Hlama Lenaneo la Gago la go Laola Kotsi (RMP)
legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Mogato wa 1 go ya go 4: Dintlha tsa Khampani
legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Mogato wa 2 go ya go 4: Ditiro
legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Kgetha Ditiro (Tshwaya tsohle tse di Sebetsang):
legislation.wizard.step_2.option_working: Go Tira go tswa kwa Godimo
legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Mogato wa 3 go ya go 4: Dikotsi
legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Kgetha Dikotsi (Tshwaya tsohle tse di Sebetsang):
legislation.wizard.step_3.option_falls: Go Wela go tswa kwa Godimo
legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Mogato wa 4 go ya go 4: Sekaseka le go Hlama
legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Sekaseka dintlha tsa gago mme o hlame RMP ya gago. O ka oketsa melao e mengwe fa go tlhokega.
legislation.wizard.step_4.additional_leg: Oketsa Melao e Mengwe (O ka e Kgetha):
legislation.cart.title: Go Lefa
legislation.cart.description: RMP ya gago e hlamilwe! Dirisa khouto ya voucher FREERMP2025 go download ka mahala (batho ba pele ba 100).
suppliers.title: Lenaneo la Bafepedi ba OHS
suppliers.description: Fitlhela le go tshwaya bafepedi ba OHS mo Afrika Borwa. Sekaseka ka lefelo, ditirelo, le tse di netefaditsweng. Romela diphononongo go thusa ba bangwe go dira ditshwetso tse di nang le tshedimosetsong.
suppliers.list.title: Lenaneo la Bafepedi
suppliers.table.name: Leina la Mofepedi
suppliers.review_form.title: Romela Phononongo
community_tools.title: Dithuto tsa Tshireletso ya Set≈°haba
community_tools.description: Tlaleha ditiragalo tsa tshireletso kgotsa kotsi mo set≈°habeng sa gago kgotsa mo lefelong la gago la tiro, go tswa mo dikgopong go ya go didirisiwa tse di senyegileng. Dirisa dithuto tsa rona go netefatsa tshireletso mo mafelong a a kang dikgwebisana tsa spaza, dikolo, dipetlele, le ditavern.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Tlaleha Tiragalo kgotsa Kotsi
community_tools.incident_report.photo_la: Upload Senepe sa Tiragalo (O ka se Kgetha):
community_tools.incident_report.location: Lefelo le tla bonwa ka bo ikgetseng...
community_tools.incident_report.weather_: Boemo ba lefitshane bo tla bonwa ka bo ikgetseng...
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Tlhhalosa tiragalo kgotsa kotsi (mohlala, sekgope mo Main Street, setulo se se robegileng mo senthareng ya set≈°haba)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_nam: Leina la Gago (O ka se Kgetha):
community_tools.incident_report.user_con: Dintlha tsa go Ikgolaganya le Gago (O ka se Kgetha):
Tsenya mogala kgotsa imeile ya gago...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Leina la Gago la Set≈°haba (O ka se Kgetha, mohlala, @username mo X):
Tsenya leina la gago la X...
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Dintlha tsa go Ikgolaganya le Mofepedi wa Tirelo (O ka se Kgetha):
Tsenya mogala kgotsa imeile (e tla tlatsetswe ka bo ikgetseng fa mofepedi a kgethilwe)...
Leina la Set≈°haba la Mofepedi wa Tirelo (O ka se Kgetha, mohlala, @CityofJoburgZA mo X):
Tsenya leina la X (le tla tlatsetswe ka bo ikgetseng fa mofepedi a kgethilwe)...
community_tools.incident_report.employee: Tsela ya go ya go Motsomi (Bakeng sa Ditho Fela):
community_tools.list.title: Dithuto tse Dingwe tsa Tshireletso ya Set≈°haba
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Lelista la go Lekola OHS la Kgwebisana ya Spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Netefatsa gore kgwebisana ya gago ya spaza e tlangiwa ka tshireletso ya mollo, motlakase, le ditlhoko tsa kago go ya ka melao ya bomasepala le Molao wa OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Tataiso ya Tshireletso ya Mollo ya Sekolo
community_tools.list.school.description: Ithute ditlhoko tsa molao tsa tshireletso ya mollo mo dikolong, go akaretsa mananeo a go tswa le didirisiwa.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Tataiso ya go Itukisetsa Tshoganyetso ya Sepetlele
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Netefatsa gore dipetlele di itukisetsa ditlhokwa tsa tshoganyetso ka mananeo a go tswa a a siameng le didirisiwa tsa tshireletso.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Lelista la go Lekola Tshireletso ya Tavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Lekola gore ditavern di tlangiwa ka tshireletso ya mollo le go laola bongata go thibela ditiragalo.
dashboard.title: Dashboard ya Setho
dashboard.welcome: Amogelang, [Leina la Modirisi]! Laola go tlangiwa ka gago ka OHS, RMPs, diphononongo tsa bafepedi, le dingxelo tsa set≈°haba mo.

document_categories.title: Hlama Ditokomane tsa Gago tsa Sistimi ya go Laola OHS
document_categories.description: Kgetha le go hlama ditokomane tseo o di tlhokang bakeng sa sistimi ya gago ya go laola OHS. Kgetha mo diphulising, diphrosese, maemo, le tse dingwe, tse di dirilweng ka boikaelelo go ya ka ditlhoko tsa mokgatlho wa gago.
document_categories.policies.title: Diphulisi
document_categories.policies.description: Dipolelo tsa maemo a kwa godimo tsa maikaelelo le boikgantsho, tse di dumeletswe ke balaodi ba kwa godimo.
